Options.OPTION_DESCRIPTION[AdvancedRoadT:
Prevent occupied cells from being overridden during preview and set phase of Zone Controller Tool.
Set this to true if you're having problem with buildings becoming vacant and/or abandoned when using the tool.
Default: true
ToolOptions.TOOLTIP_DESCRIPTION[Advanced: Definir zonas apenas no lado direito.
Options.OPTION[AdvancedRoadTools.Advance: Impedir que células com zona sejam removidas
Impedir que células ocupadas sejam removidas
Options.OPTION_DESCRIPTION[AdvancedRoadT:
Prevent zoned cells from being overridden during preview and set phase of Zone Controller Tool.
Set this to true if you're having problem with losing your zoning configuration when using the tool.
Default: true
Inverte a configuração atual de zoneamento com uma ação do rato.
ToolOptions.TOOLTIP_DESCRIPTION[Advanced: Definir zonas apenas no lado esquerdo.
Definir zonas em ambos os lados.
Assets.DESCRIPTION[Zone Controller Tool]:
Tool to control how the zoning of a road behaves.
Choose between zoning on both sides, only on the left or right, or no zoning for that road.
By default, right-click inverts the zoning configuration.
